channel.title: How do i change starting stats
channel.description: Ok i know this is the noobiest question but in player.java i cant find out how to change starting stats (delta)

item.title: How do i change starting stats
item.dc:creator: @Valhalla95 Valhalla95
item.description:
@Valhalla95 wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:8, topic:288638”]just do it and fine lol

if(starter == 0){
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(555, 500);
addItem(560, 500);
addItem(565, 500);
addItem(386, 500);
addItem(158, 500);
addItem(146, 500);
addItem(140, 500);
addItem(527, 50);
addSkillXP(0, 14000000);
starter = 1;
Clientbots(0, 1," : Type::train. ");
}[/quote]

and again

@s3x 4 u l1f3 USE THE FRIKEN CODE TAGS

item.title: How do i change starting stats
item.dc:creator: @Valhalla95 Valhalla95
item.description:
@Valhalla95 wrote:

[quote=“s3x 4 u l1f3, post:5, topic:288638”]here
if(starter == 0){
addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(555, 500);
addItem(560, 500);
addItem(565, 500);
addItem(386, 500);
addItem(158, 500);
addItem(146, 500);
addItem(140, 500);
addItem(527, 50);
starter = 1;
Clientbots(0, 1," : Type::train. ");
}
add there it

addSkillXP(0, 2); 0-is skill id 2 is expireance make 2 to 140000000 to make 99skill
and it will wath like dis

addItem(995, 1000000);
addItem(555, 500);
addItem(560, 500);
addItem(565, 500);
addItem(386, 500);
addItem(158, 500);
addItem(146, 500);
addItem(140, 500);
addItem(527, 50);

starter = 1;
Clientbots(0, 1," : Type::train. ");
}

now its 99att[/quote]

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet toX = 2999+misc.random(3); toY = 3377+misc.random(3);
